name: Cursed Tomb (QatariGameDev)
description:
The cursed tomb, a place that no one can survive.

Story:

According to tradition, there is a mummy buried deep within the ruins that may hold the secrets of a long-lost civilization.

Many people attempted to find the tomb, but only a few succeeded; it is thought that the tomb is cursed.

Developed by QatariGameDev & MikadoSc

T___T

We were in such a hurry that we tried to add more elements, but maybe we managed to finish something at least for the game jam, as this game was developed in just three days.

Control:
keyboard arrow for movement

[Z] for dash

[X] for attack
